Title: Simply Play MIDI
Description:
The simplest way to play MIDI music with Unity.
No script is used, everything is defined in the inspector.

Title: Play MIDI with script
Description: How to integrate MPTK into your application using a script. Utilize the MPTK API with just a few lines of code.

Title: Multi MIDI Player
Description: Four MidiFilePlayer prefabs are set up on a 3D scene, each experimenting with a simple spatialization function as the camera moves... all without a spatializer!

Title: MIDI File Loading
Description: Load all or a portion of the MIDI events from the MIDI DB or from disk (Pro version). This doesn't include a sequencer, synthesizer, or music playing capabilities, it simply loads and decodes a MIDI file into a more user-friendly MPTKEvent.

Title: MIDI Stream Music
Description: Generate real-time music notes without any MIDI files using just a few lines of code. Additionally, the Pro version allows you to play chords and ranges, and apply real-time parameter changes such as attack, effect, and others.

Title: Catch Music
Description: Notes are read from a MidiFilePlayer and fall onto a conveyor belt. At the end, they are played with a MidiStreamPlayer. Unfortunately, some monsters come to disturb the music. This could potentially become a game!

Title: MIDI Spatialization
Description:
An erratic sphere plays MIDI music to experiment with the Spatialization function.
Set the spatialization mode in Unity for an optimal experience!

Title: MIDI Play List
Description: Play a list of MIDI or part of MIDI with time overlap.

Title: Euclidean Rhythm
Description:
An interesting and original algorithm to generate rhythms.
Moreover, interactive synthesizer parameters can be changed by the user and real-time events can be applied for a very Accurate Music Generator.
Script:
TestEuclideanRhythme.cs
See EuclideSeq folder for all source code.

Title: MIDI File Writer
Description:
Numerous short examples for building, writing, and directly playing a MIDI with the easy-to-use API MPTKWriter class.
This class also serves as the foundation for the MIDI Editor.

Title: Play External MIDI
Description: Select MIDI files from your desktop or a website and play them. Check out the amazing roulette midi :)

Title:
Channel and Track
Spatialization
Description:
Each sphere is associated with a dedicated MIDI Synth by channel or track, each with its own audiosource and real-time 3D position.
You can fly between instruments and locate each instrument in a 3D space.
Set the spatialization mode in Unity for an optimal experience.

Title:
Read MIDI Keyboard
and Play notes
Description: Demo for the prefab MidiInReader, capable of reading MIDI events from a connected midi keyboard. In the demo, MIDI events from the keyboard are played by the MPTK Midi Synth. A plugin available on the website is required for installation.

Title:
Read/Write from/to a
MIDI Keyboard
Description:
Read/Write MIDI events from/to a connected midi keyboard.
A plugin available on the website is required for installation.

Title: Merge MIDI Files
Description: Load MIDI files from the MIDI DB, merge or insert them at a defined position, save as an external MIDI File or in the MIDI DB. All these actions can be performed while playing!

Title: Inner Loop
Description: Quick demonstration for MIDI inner loop. A very accurate MIDI looper.

Title: Music Wood Box
Description:
Transform your smartphone or tablet into a wood instrument. Thanks to the sensitive surface with low latency for playing music.
Always in development mode.

Title: Load External SoundFont
Description:
Load a SoundFont from a website or from your device.
Perfect for downsizing your app or offering options for different instruments or styles.
